en.description: A Battle Avionics that leave a trail of fire dealing 200 damage per second to enemies. gain 10% speed and 22% damage reduction while active. accumulates 60 damage per second that unleashes upon deactivation over 175m. flux energy cost: 50 flux on use. 5 per second while active. drops from exo outrider (veil.)
